official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the consideration of the age of housing in determining area eligibility and project selection under the urban development action grant program.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the consideration of the age of housing in determining area eligibility and project selection under the urban development action grant program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the consideration of the age of housing in determining area eligibility and project selection under the urban development action grant program.
